title: Client crashing
body: Hello, my client keeps crashing whenever i open my hextech crafting. Is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: This appears to be an issue with third party programs causing the client to crash while opening hextech or joining champion select.  If you have apps like play.tv or anything that interacts with League, remove them.  This should fix things up!
same crashes every time i go into the hextech crafting even sent a report to riot support but never got hear anything back. Its even been a week already and i have some chests i want to open.
